DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate a computer-based tool on the clinical management of patients with rheumatoid arthritis in Spain.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Impact of the Use of a Computer-based Tool on the Clinical Management of RA Patients
DOC.criteria: Main Patients, male or female, over 18 years old. Patients diagnosed with RA according to investigator criteria Patients with a disease evolution >= 1 year Patients with > = 5 affected joints Patients with other muscle skeletal, rheumatic and/or degenerative diseases different from RA. Patients who are taking part or have taken part in a clinical trial or in a study with drugs within the last 12 months. Any condition that, in the investigator's judgment would interfere with the subject's ability to comply with protocol requirements or give informed consent.
